commit.message:
type_traits (aligned_storage): Use __aligned__ instead of aligned.

2005-01-23  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>

	* include/tr1/type_traits (aligned_storage): Use __aligned__ instead
	of aligned.

From-SVN: r94107
